description:
Rhett is a hot bodybuilder with a lot of self confidence. He has this very assured demeanor that you don't see in many people.

I met him on a road trip and he was my last appointment for the day. That ended up being a good thing because he has a loud voice and as I also found out, he is very loud when he masturbates. So loud, in fact, that the hotel that we filmed in asked us to leave.

Oh well, it wasn't the first time and I'm sure it won't be the last...
title: Rhett
